description: Try our easy to follow Moist Chocolate Yoghurt Cake with Easy Chocolate Curls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Moist Chocolate Yoghurt Cake with Easy Chocolate Curls
name: Moist Chocolate Yoghurt Cake with Easy Chocolate Curls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread chocolate evenly over a clean work surface or marble board and set aside for 15 minutes or until set. Run an ice-cream scoop along the surface of the chocolate to create curls.
